Depleting Items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Items, Accessories, Foods: Depleting Items
By Trickster on Saturday, September 29, 2001 - 08:06 am:

Note: 10 of these items can be kept at one time.

Bitter Garlic - Used to change raising style toward "hard"
Black Pearl
Broiled Fish
Coral
Diet Grass - Greatly reduces body weight
Dodorin Fruit
Energy Ball - Used to get rid of Illnesses
Gassy Potato - Adjusts nutrition
Gao Gao Nut
Honey Candy
Large Egg - Ameliorates negative attributes like "Arthritis"
Moak Soup - Adjusts nutrition
Monster Nip
Nitro Juice
Pretty Flower
Saucer Fruit
Scorpion Claw - Cures colds
Spiced Cookie
Tonburi Sap
Yam Rice Cake - Slightly reduces body weight

By Trickster on Saturday, September 29, 2001 - 08:18 am:

Okay, I've posted the items (here and in two other sections) that I've found so far, and left the ability to add messages for now at least, so we can figure out just what these things *do*.

So if you have any evidence, good ideas, etc., share! Maybe we can hash some of this stuff out.

For my own contribution... I'm not sure yet exactly what it means when one of the monster's characteristics displays, then switches over to "good," (I've noticed it happening in various circumstances), but when I fed my Hengar some Nitro Juice at one point, I got the display of "Radar" and then "Good." A couple other times that I fed him the Nitro Juice, nothing happened. Any ideas?
